title: Special Cabinet Meeting today (6)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Cabinet Spokesperson Minister (Dr.) Nalaka Godahewa noted that the President has called for a special cabinet meeting today (6) at 5.30 PM at the Presidents’ House.
Gunapala Ratnasekera says he resigned, but President refused to accept
(VIDEO) Police fire tear gas and water cannons on IUSF protest near Parliament
